data.headline: Junior Backend Engineer
data.summary: Passionate and adaptable junior backend engineer with a strong foundation in computer science and a keen interest in problem-solving. Eager to contribute to innovative projects and collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality, scalable solutions. Committed to continuous learning and staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and industry trends.

experience.title: Junior Backend Developer
bullets: Developed and maintained RESTful APIs using Django and Django REST Framework, ensuring scalability and reliability.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement database schemas, leveraging SQL and PostgreSQL.
Participated in the deployment and configuration of applications on AWS infrastructure, including EC2, RDS, and S3.
Contributed to the implementation of CI/CD pipelines using Git, GitHub Actions, and Docker for seamless application delivery.

experience.title: Intern, Backend Development
bullets: Assisted in the development and testing of backend components for a web-based application using Python and Django.
Gained experience in working with agile methodologies, participating in scrum ceremonies and collaborating with the development team.

projects.name: Personal Blog
projects.description: Developed a personal blog using Django, PostgreSQL, and Bootstrap, with features like user authentication, content management, and responsive design.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Friendly, approachable expression. Neutral background.
